column5: Current measure connector. Shorted in normal operation
Current measure connector. Shorted in normal operation

Reference: J5 J6 J7 J8 J9 J10

column5:
STM8L151GxUx, STM8L152GxUx, other devices are not fully compatible (STM8L101G3U6ATR and
STM8L101G2U6ATR - PA5 is replaced by PA6 pin, STM8L101GxUx – no external oscillators)
Optional, with heat shrink insulation if mounted horizontally
